details:
verb
- to engage fully
= example: to engage fully
- to serve oneself to, or consume regularly
= synonyms: take
- to use up resources or materials
= example: to use up resources or materials
= synonyms: exhaust
- to spend extravagantly
= synonyms: waste
- to eat immoderately
= example: to eat immoderately
= synonyms: go through
- to destroy completely
= example: to destroy completely
= synonyms: ruin
